name: Xyron

levels.Ⅰ: :activation: Discard 2 cards. Then select a space. All [units](../units/index.md) on this and the adjacent spaces take 1 :damage:.
levels.Ⅳ: :activation: Discard 1 card. Then select a space. All [units](../units/index.md) on this and the adjacent spaces take 1 :damage:.
levels.Ⅵ: :activation: Select a space. All [units](../units/index.md) on this and the adjacent spaces take 1 :damage:.

notes: The :damage: from Inferno also applies to friendly units.
